Name: Phaseshift
About the game: FRANTIC COMBAT RACING Cyberpunk styled combat racing inspired by all the amazing 90's and 00's racers! Featuring fast paced, frantic racing action with intense strategic combat across 25 tracks! Start your career in the single player Early Access league with 5+ championships to test your skills in! EXPLOSIVE WEAPONS AND ABILITIES Equip four types of abilities simultaneously for ultimate destructive capabilities! Load up with homing missiles, plasma launchers, laser cannons, proximity mines, drone turrets and more! 16+ abilities available for a multitude of combinations. Strategy and combos are key if you want to quickly dispatch opponents. MANAGE YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM Change team liveries, colours, chassis, race numbers, wheels, loadout and more. Build relationships with fellow pilots and draft them on your team. Research abilities and technologies then set your loadouts before the event. MASTER GAME MODES Loads of game modes to conquer! Races, team races, elimination and time trial events available from Early Access. A vast array of options are available to customise your own custom racing experience! Add obstacles, explosive barrels, allow no weapons, set respawn times and other modifiers for a unique experience!
